mindee_predict_document.description: Parse details of a document using OCR.

props.name: account_name
props.description: Refers to your username or organization name with which you signed up with.

props.name: api_name
props.description: Refers to the name of the API your are using.

props.name: file
props.description: Remote file URL or Base64 string. We currently support .pdf (slower), .jpg, .png, .webp, .tiff and .heic formats
